comment:
{
    "VARIABLES": "Let x be the number of pop concerts and y be the number of R&B concerts, both integers.",
    "CONSTRAINTS": [
        "100x + 240y \geq 10000",
        "2x + 4y \leq 180",
        "y \leq 0.4(x+y)",
        "x \geq 0",
        "y \geq 0"
    ],
    "OBJECTIVE": "Minimize Z = x + y"
}
